Standing Desk

Jul 9, 2012 • scottlthompson

It’s hard to miss the articles and studies out there about how sitting kills. I definitely feel a lot better since I started standing up while working at the office. I also wanted to be able to stand up while at my computer in the apartment. I wonder if this would have made it into Kramer’s coffee table book about coffee tables…
